extendedInfo.description: *** Destination phone number 10-digit limitation has been removed in order to support countries that need more ***Forgot your phone at home? Can't take it to work? SMS Diversion will forward all text messages to your Gmail account or any other phone that you specify. Can also forward name and number of missed calls with contact list integration. Forgot to turn SMS Diversion on before leaving? No problem, remote activation allows for turning forwarding on or off by sending a predefined text message to your phone! Does not support MMS.***Uninstall free version before downloading Pro version.**** Forward SMS to Gmail* Forward SMS to another phone* Forward name and number of missed calls* Remote on/off* Contact list integration* Forward to any email account*** Does not support MMS***

reviews.title: Appears to cause phone to hang
reviews.comment: Appears cause phone to go offline.  since installing the phone periodically goes offline without warning.  have uninstalled and will remove comment if problem persists. If it goes away this is the cause. Problem Only started after installing this ap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does as promised, but could be better
reviews.comment: Nice little app that lets me leave my personal phone in my car/home and never again drop my personal $400 phone while on the job. The ability to turn it off/on remotely is cool.   To be WAY COOL, 5+ stars - Currently messages arrive as forwarded messages and replies just go back to your phone and bounce back. To send to original sender, you have to create a new message. Sort of negates conversational text. I\'d like to be able to reply directly to sender and better yet, the option of passing it through my personal phone since many won\'t recognize my work number.   AND, a forwarded message should be marked as read, so it stops reminding me. In my case, it shows as an unanswered text and dings reminders all day, sucking the battery down. Yea, I know I can turn this off, but it\'s one more thing I have to do every morning after forwarding the phone calls, then activating Diversion Pro.
reviews.author: Steve Bean

reviews.comment: Does not work on xperia x10 mini pro with go sms. Works on Desire with stock firmware.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works perfectly! Please don\'t change a thing!
